DataElement.preferredName: Medical Contraindication Known Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator to determine eligibility for clinical trial participation for questions related to symptoms or medical conditions that make specific treatments or procedures inadvisable because a person is likely to have a bad reaction.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical Contraindication Known Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any special symptom or circumstance that renders the use of a remedy or the carrying out of a procedure inadvisable, usually because of the risk._Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any special symptom or circumstance that renders the use of a remedy or the carrying out of a procedure inadvisable, usually because of the risk.

Concepts.definition: A symptom or medical condition that makes a particular treatment or procedure inadvisable because a person is likely to have a bad reaction.

Property.preferredDefinition: Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Recognized, familiar, or within the scope of knowledge.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/29/17 tt added CSI per Round 5 finalization task. 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. jk

ReferenceDocuments.name: Does the patient have known c
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have known contraindications to bevacizumab, including but not limited to abdominal fistula, GI perforation, intra-abdominal abscess, thrombotic or hemorrhagic disorders, uncontrolled hypertension or active clinically significant cardiovascular disease, non-healing wound, ulcer, or bone fracture within 4 weeks prior to registration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: URCC22063
ReferenceDocuments.description: Have contraindications to physical function assessments (30-second arm curl, Timed-Up-And-Go test, or 30-second chair-stand test) per the treating provider or their designee.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CCTG_01
ReferenceDocuments.description: Participant has a contraindication for radical prostate radiotherapy (e.g., connective tissue disease or inflammatory bowel disease).

DataElement.origin: ACRIN:American College of Radiology Imaging Network
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 11/16/23 Added alt OID and AQT for CCTG ticket number CADSR0003085 cjl; 9/18/23 Added CSI and AQT per URMC ticket request CADSR0002862 cjl.
